summary: The story of the promising, underground Seattle band, The Gits. Fronted by charismatic vocalist, Mia Zapata, and poised to explode onto the national music scene, a stranger came in and took it all away. A decade later, the legacy lives on.
cast: Valerie M. Agnew|Scott Benson|Tim Bradshaw|Elizabeth F. Davis|Matt Dresdner|Richard Gagnon|Julian Gibson|Leah Gold|Eric Greenwalt|Kathleen Hanna|Gretta Harley|Joan Jett|Andrew Kessler|Kenny Laguna|Ben London|Maria Mabra|Mike Millet|Steve Moriarty|Russell Pachman|Mark Pollard|Ann Powers|Tim Sommer|Selene H. Vigil|Eric Zapata|Mia Zapata|Richard Zapata
title: The Gits
